name: crush-ux-monorepo
description: A modern UI component library with Storybook

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=packages/core && npm run build --workspace=packages/presets
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=packages/core && npm run lint --workspace=packages/presets
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix --workspace=packages/core && npm run lint:fix --workspace=packages/presets
scripts.format: npm run format --workspace=packages/core && npm run format --workspace=packages/presets
scripts.format:check: npm run format:check --workspace=packages/core && npm run format:check --workspace=packages/presets
scripts.release: npm run build && standard-version && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:rc: npm run build && standard-version --prerelease rc && git push --follow-tags
scripts.publish:all: npm run publish:core && npm run publish:presets

author: Christopher Rathgeb
